duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all financial performance of the property and work towards achieving budgeted NOI.
Support the leasing team by leasing apartments, responding to telephone inquiries, qualifying applicants, and show apartments.
Complete a daily inspection of the property and market-ready units.
Recruit and select team members by understanding and adhering to NRP’s selection process policies, procedures, and core values.
Provide excellent customer service and display a courteous and professional attitude toward all customers.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, Bachelor’s degree or CPM highly preferred; Tax Credit Specialist (TCS) or HCCP designation preferred
